    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Character
    Represents a generic character in the game world.
    ClanChief
    Represents a clan chief who leads a place and manages its inhabitants.
    ClanChiefMenu
    Menu to manage clan chiefs through a menu interface.
    ClanChiefMenuTest
    Uses manual input simulation and output capture.
    ClanChiefTest
    Test class for ClanChief.
    Druid
    Handles the creation of a Druid
    FantasyCreature
    This class helps to create a new Fantasy Creature
    Fighter
     
    FoodService
     
    FoodServiceTest
    Suite of unit tests for the FoodService class.
    FoodServiceTest_2
    Unit tests (number 2) for FoodService.
    FoodServiceTest_2.TestCharacter
    Small implementation of Character for testing purposes.
    Gaul
    Represents a Gaul character, a cultural subgroup of characters known for their unique battle cry and their particular affinity with magic potions.
    GaulTests
     
    GaulType
     
    Gender
     
    General
    Handles the creation of a roman General
    HealthIssue
     
    HealthResult
     
    Ingredient
     
    Ingredient.Category
    Lists all possible categories an ingredient may belong to.
    Ingredient.State
     
    Inventory<T>
    Represents an inventory that holds items up to a specified capacity.
    InventoryTest
     
    Leader
     
    Legionary
    Handles the creation of a roman Legionary
    LegionaryTests
     
    Lycanthrope
     
    LycanthropeTests
     
    MagicPotion
    Represents the magic potion of Asterix and Obelix.
    MagicPotionTest
     
    Main
     
    PersonType
     
    Place
     
    PlacesType
     
    PlaceTest
     
    Pot
     
    PotTests
    Unit test class for the Pot class.
    Prefect
    Handles the creation of a roman prefect
    Roman
     
    Storable
    Implements the getName methods to make a Storable item
    story1
     
    story2
    Entry point for the turn-based clan chief simulation.
    TheaterOfWar
    Represents a theater of war where battles occur between different factions* This class manages simulation including battles, food management, clan chief actions...etc
    TheaterOfWarTest
    Tests JUnit for TheaterOfWar
    Worker
